website_summaries.verdict: These charming kitchen mats are thickly padded and boast a standout, double-sided design that's hard to top. But for the price, some customers expect better durability.
pros: Charming prints instantly add a touch of character to any kitchen
Reversible, with a different print on each side
Well padded for effective pressure reduction and superior standing comfort
Vinyl cover is a breeze to wipe clean
cons: Some issues with the exterior peeling after some use

customer_reviews.title: That they last awhile, more than a couple of months.
customer_reviews.text: These mats are cute and pretty comfy. However for $22 a mat they are not holding up. Just bought them in October and already they are falling apart. It’s expensive when you bought 4 of them and they are all doing this.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and looks great with my chef themed kitchen. It kind of reminds me of some sort of memory foam but rubber and super sturdy. It is so easy to clean. I have had it for like 2 years now.
customer_reviews.author: Aleah Alexander

customer_reviews.title: It’s Coffee Time...
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I have it in front of my refrigerator. It is so soft on my feet. And it barely moves from where it is placed. Very colorful too.. My decor is about coffee - so looks great in my kitchen..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is nice, on smallish side and beware the chef side gets really dirty and not all dirt wipes off. Now mine looks kind of grungy and I had replaced a Costco mat that didn't show dirt as much and I'm still using in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Hip teacher

customer_reviews.title: If color is important than this is not the product for you.
customer_reviews.text: It definitely not the color like in the picture. I expected a black background with light colored cups instead it has a grey background. They should state colors varies or have the selection to choose a background color. The chef side I more of a yellow color background than a tan color. Despite this downfall it is comfortable n durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not very thick
customer_reviews.text: Design looks great, and it seems to be well made. I just wish it was thicker for more added comfort while standing on it. My plain colored anti-fatigue Mat from Sam's club is at least 2x more comfy to stand in than this one. I like it, it's just not near as comfy for standing on if I'm in the kitchen for extended periods of time
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 1 week of using !!
customer_reviews.text: We have only had this mat for a week and it's already peeling in several areas of the mat. Don't know if the mat is defective or if this is the quality of the mat. I'm very disappointed and would like a replacement or a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Make America Great Again !

customer_reviews.title: Slips on the floor
customer_reviews.text: This mat slips, it just doesn’t want to stay put. We will use it until it is used up but never again. What good are the delightful graphics if it keeps “slip sliding away”
customer_reviews.author: MADISON GRACE MCGEE

customer_reviews.title: Great mats to add character and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Was concerned if the actual mat would look as good as the ad. They do! Great in our kitchen. They stay in place and provide comfort for the feet and whimsy for the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Suesan

customer_reviews.title: Cute and effective
customer_reviews.text: This mat isn't as squishy as I was looking for, but hey, it's still some support while I'm washing dishes. I love that it's reversible and both sides are cute. It matches the cafe look I'm going for with our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: yay ILNP

customer_reviews.title: Love that you can flip them over
customer_reviews.text: As a chef most of my life just standing in the kitchen while at the stove makes it a lot easier on your legs
customer_reviews.author: Ed Grabusic

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly & not only do they look good but they feels so good when standing on. I am so happy I purchased them!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wife Loves it
customer_reviews.text: These come in a pack of two- which is great! Every kitchen needs at least two; one for the sink, and another for the stove. These are firm, clean easily, and stick to the floor well. The designs are cute as well.
customer_reviews.author: William Fripp

customer_reviews.title: Ok mat
customer_reviews.text: When I first received the mat it stuck well to the kitchen floor but after a few weeks it slides around.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne D.

customer_reviews.title: Really cute!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my sister for Christmas...she loves it!! It’s really cute...reversible...good quality, and a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: I was super excited to have a mat in my kitchen that ...
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to have a mat in my kitchen that would help me with standing. BUT when this mat came it first off was not black like the picture it's more like a grey/lavender. Second it's hard as a rock so it really defeats the purpose of the softer mats like I thought I was getting. Overall it looks nice but doesn't match anything now and doesn't do what I needed it to do.
customer_reviews.author: what did u say

customer_reviews.title: Not great anti-fatique
customer_reviews.text: Liked the idea of double sided art work but the anti fatigue part is hard. Have one inch anti fatigue mats from another company and they are like heaven to stand on but aren't decorative so tried the art ones.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Risner

customer_reviews.title: Love that it is easy to clean and waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Spouse dropped food on this and it was super easy to clean....no stains either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High-quality, cute, comfortable and waterproof. Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a kitchen mat that is comfortable to stand on, high-quality with some cute print. This mat is everything that I was looking for. And, it is even waterproof and at a reasonable price. I am buying another one when the 3 chef print is available from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: E.K.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed. Little pricey though
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for my kitchen floor. Little pricey though for the size
customer_reviews.author: pkgb

customer_reviews.title: Color is Gray
customer_reviews.text: Decent comfort and durability for the price, but the pictures on Amazon make it look black, and it is actually gray.
customer_reviews.author: Jason W. Paquette

customer_reviews.title: Nice mats.
customer_reviews.text: These mats are really nice and so comfortable to stand on. No more leg or foot pain.
customer_reviews.author: Kandi

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen matt
customer_reviews.text: Cleans easily and like that you can have a fun look with the Italian chefs, and turn it over for a whole new look
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: During the holidays I spend a great deal of time on my feet cooking and baking
customer_reviews.text: During the holidays I spend a great deal of time on my feet cooking and baking. This mat has certainly helped with leg fatigue.
customer_reviews.author: ginnie

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Handy to have and I like the two different images
customer_reviews.author: sherylbow

customer_reviews.title: Lasts about a year before it peels.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my cafe-themed kitchen. Comfy to stand on but after a year, I had to flip it over cuz it started peeling.
customer_reviews.author: Mariam Dirbashi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The color is better than the picture and good quality deserves the money
customer_reviews.author: Marwa

customer_reviews.title: Quick Solution
customer_reviews.text: Saves your feet on the tile floor. Good price and liked the reversibility.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love my rug! Exactly as pictured and I like that it isn't a cloth material, easy to clean and keep nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace a mat in front of my kitchen sink. Just what we wanted and great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G. Mammele

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with the art 3 D kitchen mat
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the art 3 D kitchen mat. It is easy to keep clean and my guests compliment me on my choice
customer_reviews.author: .Marilyn Kindle Customer.

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: this is a very comfortable mat.. i ordered 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: fabrice lenord

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ehhh... not worth the money. They're OK but I wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.author: Brian W

customer_reviews.title: So not something that's terribly durable. At all
customer_reviews.text: Cute mat. However, the design started to peel within a week of having it. So not something that's terribly durable. At all.
customer_reviews.author: S. Stutts

customer_reviews.title: Buy a better quality mat
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these mats as my wife is a coffee aficionado. Unfortunately after a week in out kitchen; the surface of the mat has already peeled off in several areas (mostly the corners). They look terrible and actually worse than the mats I replaced them with.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B

customer_reviews.title: Cute, little rug
customer_reviews.text: I liked that this rug arrived quickly and went nicely in my white kitchen. I like that it has two sides to switch it up. It is thinner than expected but is still a nice little cushion while loading the dishwasher. I think the price was average and it seems to be good quality. I plan on ordering another one for in front of the stove.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for my dog's water bowl
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made mat, which I'm using to hold my dog's very large water bowl. It's pretty sturdy, because after a couple of months it still looks like new, no damage at all, even though it's regularly stepped on by my 100-lb Rottweiler. The graphics are nicely done and the colors are bright.
customer_reviews.author: Deedee

customer_reviews.title: Great for standing and cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Great cushioned rug for by the stove. Nice and big and comfortable for those times you have to stand for awhile at the stove. I love that is reversible. My husband loves the chefs and my favorite is the other side with the coffee print. The texture is smooth plastic or something and you can just wipe up spills easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and reversible I may buy another with different design soon.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. I brought one then ordered another. My Remedy to preserve my investment is not wearing boots or sneakers and set it aside when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: chefx42

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: It slides around too much! I almost fell several times
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Mat
customer_reviews.text: Can not said enough nice things about this mat. My husband makes aufull mess at sink. It is so easy too clean and just beautiful. Diana
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute kitchen floor mat
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave it a 4 star is because the colorations were off to what the picture showed. Other than that I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda345

customer_reviews.title: Attractive kitchen mat
customer_reviews.text: Coffee motif in the morning and French chefs the rest of the time. Both sides are attractive and durable. Very comfortable to stand on...
customer_reviews.author: MikeyrInJeff

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, took 3 weeks to ship
customer_reviews.text: Cant say on durability. Had one from bed bath and it was thicker and lasted forever. Hope this one will. It took 3 weeks to ship.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Fielitz

customer_reviews.title: Nice mat but...
customer_reviews.text: The only (slight) issue I have with it is that it is a bit stiff for an "anti-fatigue comfort mat". Not as comfortable as the ones I have stood on before. It is still a nice mat for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Allen McPherson

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price! Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Works really good! I forgot it was two sided and went to sweep and was so excited about the other side hah! Lasts through a lot of wear and tear!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: It's very comfy on the feet when doing the dishes. Also keeps the floor in that area clean. The mat itself is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: godzilla's girl

customer_reviews.title: Double useful
customer_reviews.text: It is really nice and I love that I can switch the sides so when my cats tear it up (which they inevitably will) I will get another whole new use out of it
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable mat
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase for under $15! I love the coffee cup design.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great Matt!
customer_reviews.text: Matt is adorable and matches my kitchen no matter what season or color scheme I choose! Very plush and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mat but slides around so put pad under and ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect mat but slides around so put pad under and now it stays put. Darling design that matches my kitchen decor.
customer_reviews.author: St. Louis, MO

customer_reviews.title: Just the right amount of cushion!
customer_reviews.text: This mat has good cushion, and size. Great for the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Daveheart

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Love the artwork and it has held up very well. It makes standing at the sink and stove so much more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: BethStamps

customer_reviews.title: Pretty kitchen rug.
customer_reviews.text: I have this rug in front of my sink. Very comfortable and easy to keep clean. I was very pleased with it. Very pretty too
customer_reviews.author: mickeyb

customer_reviews.title: They look great
customer_reviews.text: They don’t seem to hold up as good if you stand on them a lot
customer_reviews.author: VANCE Todd

customer_reviews.title: This one is much nicer and very comfortable when working at the sink
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace a similar mat as my cat got to pulling it apart. This one is much nicer and very comfortable when working at the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Sferratore

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the size
customer_reviews.text: The mat is comfortable to stand on and a great size for my kitchen. Offers great coverage for the space in front of the sink. It is reversible too.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Caravaggio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty Rugs, not as brown and dark as they look on screen. More of a milk chocolate color
customer_reviews.author: Wiz

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Nice mat. Will be easy to clean and I can change the look at any time by reversing!
customer_reviews.author: FormicaBuckles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The mat is very soft and comfortable under my feet. It was the perfect size for the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Rocheryl Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stuff!!! Great quality, plus you can never go wrong with these French chefs.
customer_reviews.author: Ivory

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for under the sink -- replaced ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for under the sink -- replaced a kitchen rug with this anti-fatigue pad -- much more practical!
customer_reviews.author: csk8s

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and doesn't slip or slide. Like the two sided option and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Ball

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great - but could be more comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The mat is absolutely adorable! I wish it offered more comfort to stand on (it's not very "cushionny"), but it gets some of the job done while looking great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Art3d Premium Double-Sided Anti-Fatigue Chef Rug, Anti-Fatigue Comfort Mat. Multi-Purpose Decorative Standing Mat for The Kitchen, Bathroom, Laundry Room or Office, 18" X 30"
feature_bullets: Reversible Kitchen Mat, Two Styles (different pictures on front side and back side)
Includes one Art3d non-skid, non-slip 18" x 30" bounce comfort chef mat
Easy care, wipe clean with a damp cloth or sponge
Durable vinyl cover with non skid rubber/polyethylene construction
Stain, abrasion and fade resistant for long lasting beauty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars176 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
